Authors:
Santhiti Vadthanarat, Olivier Raspe, saisamorn -
Lumyong
Title:
Heimioporus subcostatus, a new species (Boletaceae) from
northern and northeastern Thailand
Abstract:
A novel bolete species, Heimioporus subcostatus is
described from northern and northeastern Thailand. It can be
distinguished from the other Heimioporus species by its reddish-brown
basidiomata when young becoming dull red to pale red at maturity, with
raised and prominent reticulation on stipe. Macroscopic and microscopic
descriptions, as well as illustrations of the new species are
presented.
